translated: Homage to the One Who Holds the Vajra!

original: bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje ni //

translated: Has a blue body with blazing light,

original: rdo rje'i stobs kyis 'byung po 'dul //
analyzed: rdo rje'i stobs kyis 'byung po 'dul //
translated: Subduing spirits with the power of the vajra,

original: rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: las kyi gnod sbyin chen po rnams //

analyzed: 'jigs byed khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: lcang lo can gyi gnas mchog dam pa na //
analyzed: lcang lo can gyi gnas mchog dam pa na //
translated: In the supreme, sublime abode of Aḍakavatī,

original: gsang sngags rig sngags kun gyi bdag po ste //
analyzed: gsang sngags rig sngags kun gyi bdag po ste //
translated: You are the lord of all secret mantras and knowledge mantras,

original: log 'dren bgegs kyi tshogs rnams 'joms mdzad pa //🔽bcom ldan rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: log 'dren bgegs kyi tshogs rnams 'joms mdzad pa // bcom ldan rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Conquering the hosts of obstructing forces and misleaders,🔽I pay homage to you, Blessed Vajrapāṇi.

original: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la bstod pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la bstod pa rdzogs so//
translated: The praise of the Blessed One Vajrapāṇi is complete.
